basics.name: Jordan Price
basics.label: Computational and Molecular Biologist
basics.summary: I am currently a senior specialist in Plant Pathology department of NIAB, Cambridge, UK. My current work is focussed on functional and comparative genomics of fungi important for food, viticulture and agriculture.

education.summary: The role of chromatin modifications on gene expression in early Xenopus development.

work.name: NIAB, Plant Pathology, Cambridge
work.summary: Junior group leader working on collaborative project with Quorn. Utilizing whole genome sequencing and variant analysis pipelines, together with CRISPR based deletion and base editing, and phenotypic characterization.

work.name: NIAB, Cambridge Crop Research, Cambridge
work.summary: Worked on the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation-funded ENSA project, using comparative genomics to investigate the evolutionary underpinnings of actinorhizal nitrogen fixing symbiosis.
